content: daisy steering wheel cover materials size 3 yarn i used baby bee sweet delight which is 60% acrylic and 40% nylon in colors angel toy elephant teddy and airplane size 4mm hook darning needle to weave in ends pattern written in us terms made of 15 granny squares measuring 2 ¼ inch each fits steering wheel measuring 15 inches across or 48 inches around if need larger or smaller cover measure wheel around and then measure connected squares completely stretched to get preferred size if not using same yarn i did you may want to measure squares stretched as you connect to get correct final size not all yarns stretch the same make 15 granny squares 1 with color teddy make a magic_ring 2 6 single_crochet in magic_ring connect with slip_stitch to first single_crochet chain 1 3 *work in back loops only* 2 single_crochet in first stitch 2 single_crochet next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet total connect with slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off 4 pull beginning tail through middle tighten circle and weave in end on right side of circle turn circle to wrong side to create petals 5 *work in back loops only this round* working on wrong side of circle and back loops only connect color angel in any single_crochet and chain 2 double_crochet 2 together in same single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet 3 together chain 1 in next 11 stitches should have chain one between each cluster connect with slip_stitch to first double_crochet 2 together fasten_off 12 petals total 6 connect color toy elephant in any chain 1 space chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space chain 1 2 double_crochet in next 2 chain 1 space * 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space 2 double_crochet in next 2 chain 1 space * repeat from * 2 times double_crochet 3 in first chain 1 space chain 2 then slip_stitch to top of first chain 3 fasten_off leave a long tail for connecting squares 7 using long end tail place squares right side together whip stitch back loops of each double_crochet and chain space be sure to do back loops of chain spaces and only last and first chain of corner chain 2 at end i placed a single knot to keep tight then weaved in end connect first and final square in strip the same way to create a circle edging do on both sides of connected squares 1 connect color toy elephant in any corner chain 2 space to left of square connection single_crochet in every double_crochet and chain space 2hdc in every connection between squares 15 single_crochet per square and 2 half_double_crochet in each connection space connect last half_double_crochet with slip_stitch to first single_crochet chain 1 2 start decreasing *single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet single_crochet 2 together in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet 2 together in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet single_crochet 2 together in next 2 half_double_crochet * repeat from * 14 times
